items.instruction: Users created on target systems use temporary password. Reset manually if passwords are managed by STEP.

  <STEPWorkflows>
    <STEPWorkflow ID="ImageDeduplication">

<!-- Definition:
<scxml name="ImageDeduplication" initial="ClericalReview" version="0.9">

    <data id="DuplicateSet" attribute="ImageDeduplicationDuplicateSet"/>

  <final id="End" name="End" discontinued="false">

    <transition event="Submit" target="End"/>
    <editorLayout>   node-size-and-position x=250.0 y=120.0 w=100.0 h=25.0  </editorLayout>
  </state>
</scxml> -->
      <SetupGroupLink SetupGroupID="Workflows"/>
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">Image Deduplication</Name>

      <Configuration></Configuration>
      <LocalBusinessRule ID="acn-f1dc65b6-d4dd-499b-b894-00da4a686d17" Scope="Local" Type="Action" RunPrivileged="true">

Workflow=
Message=Image Deduplication Completed

        <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">Remove Object from Workflow</Name>

    <STEPWorkflow ID="TranslationReviewWF">
